turns.content:
Here's the lecture breakdown in table format, with the minutes allocated for each topic:

| Minutes | Topic |
| --- | --- |
| 10 | Introduction and Course Overview |
| 15 | Brief History of Artificial Intelligence |
| 15 | What is Artificial Intelligence? |
| 20 | AI Applications and Real-World Examples |
| **10** | **Break** |
| 20 | Introduction to Intelligent Agents |
| 20 | Problem Solving and Search |
| 10 | Wrap-up and Next Steps |

This table gives you a clear overview of the time allocation for each topic, totaling 120 minutes for the first week's lecture on Artificial Intelligence.
my class start at 4-6pm, Please include the time column

Here's the lecture breakdown in table format, with the time and minutes allocated for each topic:

| Start Time | End Time | Minutes | Topic |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 4:00 PM | 4:10 PM | 10 | Introduction and Course Overview |
| 4:10 PM | 4:25 PM | 15 | Brief History of Artificial Intelligence |
| 4:25 PM | 4:40 PM | 15 | What is Artificial Intelligence? |
| 4:40 PM | 5:00 PM | 20 | AI Applications and Real-World Examples |
| **5:00 PM** | **5:10 PM** | **10** | **Break** |
| 5:10 PM | 5:30 PM | 20 | Introduction to Intelligent Agents |
| 5:30 PM | 5:50 PM | 20 | Problem Solving and Search |
| 5:50 PM | 6:00 PM | 10 | Wrap-up and Next Steps |

This table gives you a clear overview of the time allocation for each topic, adjusted for a class starting at 4:00 PM and ending at 6:00 PM.
